Description: [Explosive Flask] Enemies hit with Explosive Flask take 35% increased damage from your weapon shots for 4s. Surgery (+10% Damage Done)
ShortDesc: Targets hit with Explosive Flask take increased damage from your Weapon Shots for 4s. Surgery.

Description: [Weapon] Potion Launcher also Heals allies hit for 700 and your Potion Launcher fire rate is increased by 10%. You no longer take damage from your weapon shots. Curative (+20% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Hitting an ally with Healing Potion increases your attack speed. Curative

Description: [Healing Potion] Healing Potion's Healing is increased by 100% and now provides a Stacking 200 Shield. Remedy (+5% Damage and +10% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Healing Potion heals for more and provides a shield.

Description: [Poison Bolts] Increase the damage done by Poison Bolts by 15% and the rate at which they deal damage by 75%.
ShortDesc: Poison Bolts deals more damage, twice as fast.

Description: [Armor] When activating Hidden, refill Wrist Crossbow's Ammo. While Hidden is active, reduce the damage you take by 75%, but reduce the maximum duration of Hidden to 3s. The duration of Hidden cannot be increased.
ShortDesc: DR and MS while Hidden is active

Description: [Smoke Screen] Benefits from your Smoke Screen cards also benefit allies who enter Smoke Screen and allies are Healed for 100 every 1s while in your Smoke Screen, but Smoke Screen no longer applies Stealth to you.
ShortDesc: [Smoke Screen] Smoke Screen card benefits now also affect allies

Description: [Shield] Your Shield now uses a resource that Regenerates over time instead of using a Cooldown.
ShortDesc: Your Shield has an infinite Duration

Description: [Charge] You now have 2 charges of Charge, each Charge deals an additional 100 damage, and you are Immune to Crowd Control while Charging, but the Cooldown of Charge is increased to 13s.
[Fireball] Increase the damage of Fireball by 35%, decrease its Cooldown by 1s, and deal 20% increased damage for each subsequent target hit after the first.
ShortDesc: Fireball deals more damage and even more for each subsequent target hit.

Description: [Dome Shield] Dome Shield now costs 40% Ultimate charge and places a Flamethrower Turret with modified values and no Shield. Can have two active at once.
[Barricade] Increase the maximum Health of Barricade by 2000 and reduce its Cooldown by 3s.
ShortDesc: Barricade gains more Health and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: [Weapon] Modify your Blunderbuss to fire a single slug that deals 600 damage.
ShortDesc: Blunderbuss now fires a slug.

Description: [Disengage] For 4s after hitting an enemy with Disengage, your weapon shots deal an additional 8% of that enemy's maximum Health as damage.
ShortDesc: After hitting an enemy with Disengage, subsequent shots will deal an additional percent of their max Health in damage for 6s.

Description: [Dodge Roll] For 8s after using Dodge Roll, your next weapon shot's damage is increased by 30%.
ShortDesc: Deal bonus damage for your next shot after Dodge Roll.

Description: [Blast Shot] Blast Shot has its damage increased by 150 and its Cooldown decreased by 2s.
ShortDesc: Increase the damage of Blast Shot and reduce the Cooldown.

Description: [Shock Pulse] Increase the damage of Lightning Staff to 70, your weapon shots reduce the Cooldown of Shock Pulse by 0.5s, and Shock Pulse chains 4 additional times. Surgery (+10% Damage Done)
ShortDesc: Your Weapon Shots reduce the Cooldown of Shock Pulse and Shock Pulse gains extra bounces. Surgery

Description: [Weapon] Hitting allies with your Lightning Staff Heals them for 800 per second and your maximum Ammo capacity is increased by 15%. Curative (+20% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Your Lightning staff now heals allies. Curative

Description: [Healing Totem] Gain a third charge of Healing Totem, increase their healing by 15%, and increase their radius of 20%. Remedy (+5% Damage and +10% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Healing Totem heals for more and gains a third charge. Remedy

Description: [Soar] Increase the damage you deal with your weapon shots by 25% for 3s after Soar ends.
ShortDesc: Deal more damage after Soar ends.

Description: [Ice Storm] Ice Storm has its damage increased by 100% and its Ultimate charge decreased by 50%, but its duration is reduced to 3s.
ShortDesc: Ice Storm deals more damage and costs less energy, but doesn't last as long.

Description: [Blink] Blink leaves behind a magical wormhole. Refire Blink within 4s of its use to return to the wormhole.
ShortDesc: Blink may be used a second time within 4s to return to the initial casting location

Description: [Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap deals 600 damage and applies a Knockback to enemies within 20 units of your landing location.
ShortDesc: Heroic Leap now deals damage and knocks up enemies near where you land.

Description: [Recovery] Using Recovery instantly Heals you for 400 and increases your maximum Health by 300 for 5s.
ShortDesc: Recovery heals for an additional amount instantly and increases your maximum Health.

Description: [Net Shot] Increase the damage you deal to targets Slowed by Net Shot by 20% and increases the duration of Net Shot's Slow by 0.5s. The damage increase lasts a minimum of 2s.
ShortDesc: Net Shot grants bonus damage for as long as the target is slowed.

Description: [Advance] Advance gains a 3rd charge and activating Advance while standing still causes you to jet upwards.
ShortDesc: Advance gains an extra charge, standing still causes Ruckus to jet upwards.

Description: [Emitter] Increase the Shield granted by Emitter by 1300.
ShortDesc: Increase Emitter's Shield Health.

Description: [Missile Launcher] Increase the radius of Missile Launcher's explosions by 66%.
ShortDesc: Increase the area of effectiveness of missile launcher explosions

Description: [Nether Step] Nether Step now has 3 separate charges and is no longer linked.
ShortDesc: Nether Step now has 3 separate charges and is no longer linked.

Description: [Defiance] Successful hits with your Revolver increase the damage of your next Defiance by 20%, stacking up to 100%.
ShortDesc: Successful hits with Revolver increase the damage of your next Defiance.

Description: [Reversal] Reversal always fires back and does an additional 800 damage.
ShortDesc: Reversal now always fires back and deals more minimum damage.

Description: [Oppressor Mine] You can have two additional Oppressor Mines out at one time and you throw out two Mines per use of the ability instead of one, but your Mines have a lifetime of 6s and the Cooldown of Oppressor Mine is increased by 2s.
ShortDesc: Headshots deal additional damage.

Description: [Transporter] Using Transporter instantly Teleports you to its target location.
ShortDesc: Transporter is now instant

Description: [Sniper Mode] For 4s after hitting a fully-charged weapon shot, your next fully-charged shot will deal an additional 20% damage.
ShortDesc: Consecutive fully charged shots deal more damage.

Description: [Crippling Throw] Crippling Throw chains to nearby enemies up to 2 times, causing a Healing aura to manifest around the nearby enemies and the original one, Healing nearby allies for 50 every 0.5s. Remedy (+5% Damage and +10% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Crippling Throw now bounces between enemies and heals self and allies. Remedy

Description: [Weapon] Increase your maximum damage scaling over distance by 60%. Surgery (+10% Damage Done)
ShortDesc: Increase your Axe's damage. Surgery

Description: [Vine] Heal for a burst of 300 and an additional 200 over 2s in a 50 unit radius at your location when you finish Vining. Curative (+20% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Healing allies with Blossom will heal them for an additional amount over time. Curative

Description: [Weapon] Deal an additional 200 damage to an enemy if you hit them with all 5 shots of Illusory Mirror.
ShortDesc: Deal increased weapon damage if you hit all 5 shots.

Description: [Shatter] Shatter instantly Heals your target for 800, but its Cooldown is increased by 1s and it no longer explodes your Illusions. Reduce the Cooldown of Shatter by 2s if you miss.
ShortDesc: Shatter now instantly heals your target for 800 health but does not explode Illusions. Reduces Cooldown of Shatter if you miss.

Description: [Shatter] If an Illusion is killed or expires, it triggers a Shatter explosion, dealing 550 damage. Also increases the effectiveness of your Shattered Illusions Movement Speed and Explosion Radius.
ShortDesc: If an Illusion is killed or expires, it triggers a Shatter explosion.

Description: [Fire Spit] Fire Spit applies a Knockback and deals an additional 300 damage over 2s.
ShortDesc: Fire Spit now knocks back and deals additional damage over 2s.

Description: [Weapon] Damage dealt when hitting an enemy directly with Rocket Launcher or Salvo is increased by 25%.
ShortDesc: Direct shots deal increased damage.

Description: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed while using your Booster.
ShortDesc: Empowered Booster.

Description: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduces the time it takes for Grumpy Bomb to explode by 40%.
ShortDesc: Grumpy Bomb explodes faster.

Description: [Detonate] Hitting with more than one Sticky Bomb on a use of Detonate increases the damage of each explosion after the first by 30% of its base damage, up to 150%.
ShortDesc: When hitting an enemy with multiple bombs, each bomb after the first deals more damage.

Description: [Weapon] Poppy Bomb now has 2 charges, but reduce its Knockback strength against enemies by 40%.
ShortDesc: Poppy Bomb now has 2 charges but its knockback against enemies is reduced.

Description: [Weapon] Switch your rifle to Three-Shot-Burst mode, increasing your effective range and firing three 210-damage shots every 0.4s.
ShortDesc: Battle Rifle

Description: [Hustle] Heal for 300 per second while using Hustle.
ShortDesc: Heal during Hustle.

Description: [Frag Grenade] Increase the radius of Frag Grenade's explosion by 40%.
ShortDesc: Frag Grenade has larger AoE.

Description: [Shell Shield] Shell Shield is placed on the ground instead of channeled around you, and lasts 2s longer.
ShortDesc: Shell Shield is now placed on the ground, is not Channeled, and lasts longer.

Description: [Ancient Rage] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 25% and Health by 500. Activating Ancient Rage resets the Cooldown of Dredge Anchor and Shell Spin, and increases Movement Speed by 20%.
ShortDesc: Turtle ults more and goes fast when ulting.

Description: [Dredge Anchor] For 4s after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor, your next weapon shot against that enemy deals 75% increased damage.
ShortDesc: Gain bonus damage on your first shot after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor.

Description: [Mending Spirits] Your Gourd no longer damages enemies, but it Heals for twice as much.
ShortDesc: Gourd deals no damage, but it's Healing effects are doubled.

Description: [Mending Spirits] Mending Spirits immediately Heals your target for an additional 350.
ShortDesc: Mending Spirits heals additional Health upfront.

Description: [Weapon] Tossing your snake after reloading is faster and deals an additional 500 damage.
ShortDesc: Snake Toss deals additional damage.

Description: [Crippling Arrow] Reduce the Cooldown of Crippling Arrow by 1s. Crippling Arrow now Silences and Slows enemies by 15% for 2s instead.
ShortDesc: Crippling shot now silences enemies

Description: [Weapon] Increase the rate at which your Longbow charges by 25%.
ShortDesc: Draw your bow faster.

Description: [Crippling Arrow] Crippling Arrow now explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on contact, dealing 300 additional damage to enemies hit, but the Cripple applied by Crippling Arrow has its duration reduced by 1s and its Cooldown is increased by 1s.
[Fire Bomb] Fire Bomb deals 30% increased damage and applies a 60% reduce healing effect.
ShortDesc: Fire Bomb deals more damage, and applies a reduced healing effect

Description: [Hunter's Mark] Hunter's Mark has 2 charges and grants its benefits to allies.
ShortDesc: Hunter's Mark's damage increase now benefits allies, it's damage increase is stronger, and has a reduced Cooldown.

Description: [Nade Launcher] Nade Launcher has 3 charges, but reduce the damage of each to 650.
ShortDesc: Nade Launcher now has 3 charges

Description: [Nullify] Double the range at which you can use Nullify.
ShortDesc: Double Nullify's range.

Description: [Protection] Increase the damage done by allies by 10% while they are Shielded by Protection.
ShortDesc: Allies affected by Protection gain additional damage while shielded.

Description: [Protection] Increase Protection's Shield Health by 300 and reduce its Cooldown by 1s.
ShortDesc: Increase the strength and reduce the Cooldown of Protection Shield.

Description: [Prowl] Increase the damage of each of your daggers from your first dagger sets within 5s of Prowl ending by 30%.
ShortDesc: Deal more damage from your first two Weapon Shots after Prowl ends.

Description: [Armor] Increase the damage done by Pounce by 15%, reduce its Cooldown by 2s, and reset Pounce's Cooldown after earning an Elimination.
ShortDesc: Eliminations reset the Cooldown of Pounce and Pounce deals more damage.

Description: [Pounce] Pounce Executes targets at or below 35% Health.
ShortDesc: Pounce executes targets below 35% health.

Description: [Earthen Guard] Reduce your damage taken by 10% and gain Immunity to Crowd Control while Earthen Guard is active.
ShortDesc: Earthen Guard gains increased Damage Reduction and now grants CC Immunity.

Description: [Warder's Field] The radius of Warder's Field is increased by 50% and it Cripples enemies within it.
ShortDesc: Warder's Field has increased radius and now cripples.

Description: [Impasse] Impasse now has 2 charges and its Cooldown is reduced to 12s, but you are unable to destroy your walls.
ShortDesc: Impasse has 2 charges and reduced cooldown, but can't get rid of walls

Description: [Weapon] Your weapon shots deal 680 damage every 0.7s, but your Ammo count is reduced.
ShortDesc: Your Weapon deals more damage, but fires more slowly and has a reduced ammo count.

Description: [Retribution] Increase the damage you deal to your Retribution target by 15%.
ShortDesc: Deal more damage to your Retribution target

Description: [Combat Slide] Gain Immunity to Crowd Control and reduce your damage taken by 90% while using Combat Slide.
ShortDesc: Gain Damage Reduction and CC Immunity while using Combat Slide.

Description: [Restore Soul] For each stack of Soul Orb detonated by Rend Soul, your next Restore Soul ignores 5% of Anti-Healing (excluding Healing disable effects) up to 25% (5 stacks) for up to 10s.
ShortDesc: Rend Soul now stuns the victim when they are afflicted with 4 Soul Charges.

Description: [Shadow Travel] You can use Restore Soul during Shadow Travel, and Shadow Travel lasts 1s longer.
ShortDesc: Increase the duration of Shadow Travel and allow casting of Restore Soul.

Description: [Rend Soul] Each Soul Charge you detonate with Rend Soul increases your maximum Health and weapon damage by 2% until you die. Stacks up to 12 times.
ShortDesc: Each Soul Charge you detonate increases your Base Health and Weapon Damage until you die. Stacks up to 12 times.

Description: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your weapon shots increases the damage they take from weapon shots by 80 for 3s, stacking up to 3 times.
ShortDesc: Weapon shots deal increasing damage.

Description: [Dead Zone] Dead Zone damage is increased to 650.
ShortDesc: Dead Zone now deals more damage when the initial explosion hits an enemy.

Description: [Seedling] Increase the damage of each Seedling to 750 and reduce the time it takes for them to explode by 25%.
ShortDesc: Increased the damage of each seedling and reduce their fuse time.

Description: [Shoulder Bash] Reduce your damage taken by 75% while using Shoulder Bash.
ShortDesc: Gain Damage Reduction while Channeling Shoulder Bash.

Description: [Siege Shield] Increase Siege Shield's maximum Health by 2500 and its size by 50%, but reduce its Movement Speed by 80%.
ShortDesc: Siege Shield moves slower, has more Health, and is larger.

Description: [Weapon] Your weapon shots travel 50% faster and 100% farther, but no longer explode.
ShortDesc: Fire more slowly but deal more damage.

Description: [Grace] Grace now hits all enemies in front of you instead of only one, but its Cooldown is increased by 1s.
ShortDesc: Grace now hits all enemies in front of you, and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: [Presence] Increase the damage of Presence by up to 50% based on the range at which it hits and reduce its Cooldown by 4s.
ShortDesc: Presence deals more damage based on range, and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with Heirloom Rifle increases your Heirloom Rifle damage against that enemy by 7% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.
[Spite] Spite deals 20% of its target's maximum Health with each hit.
ShortDesc: Spite now deals a portion of the targets maximum Health with every hit.

Description: [Billow] Heal for 15% of your maximum Health per second while using Billow.
ShortDesc: Heal a percent of your maximum Health during Billow.

Description: [Weapon] Your heavy hit with Inferno Blade deals an additional 150 damage.
[Weapon] Star Splitter now deals 360 damage every 0.4s, but reduces your maximum Ammo to 15.
ShortDesc: Star Splitter fires slower and deals more damage.

Description: [Astral Mark] All allies already affected by Astral Mark are Healed for an additional 285 when you use Astral Mark.
[Void Grip] Enemies affected by Void Grip are Crippled and take an additional 480 damage over its duration.
ShortDesc: Enemies affected by Void Grip are crippled and take additional damage over its duration.

Description: [Weapon] Talon Rifle gains non-scoped Accuracy, but deals 900 Damage, its Effective Range reduced to 200, and applies a 50 damage Burn over 1.5s. Stackable 3 times and refreshes on hit.
ShortDesc: Decreases base damage, gain un-scoped Accuracy, and adds damage over time to talon rifle shots.

Description: [Stealth] Reduce the rate of Stealth Energy consumption by 50% and increase your Movement Speed by 20% while in Stealth.
ShortDesc: Your Stealth bar consumes slower and you move faster in Stealth.

Description: [Flare] Flare deals 250% base damage, has significantly increased Projectile Speed, and has its Cooldown reduced by 10s, but no longer Reveals enemies.
ShortDesc: Flare deals more Damage, its Projectile Speed is increased, and its Cooldown is reduced.

Description: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if the Rune is not used the Cooldown is reset.
ShortDesc: Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if not activated the Cooldown resets.

Description: [Rune of Travel] Reduce the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper by 6s when you Teleport using Rune of Travel.
ShortDesc: Rune of Travel now resets the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper

Description: [True Power] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 15% and enemies at or below 65% Health are Revealed to you.
ShortDesc: Targets below 65% Health are revealed to you and your Ultimate charge rate is increased.

Description: [Shatterfall] Shatterfall Stuns enemies hit for 1s, but no longer Slows.
ShortDesc: Shatterfall now stuns enemies, but no longer slows.

Description: [Calamity Blast] Each Calamity Blast deals an additional 100 damage.
ShortDesc: Calamity Blasts deal additional damage.

Description: [Armor] Reduce the damage you take by 20% while at or below 50% Health.
ShortDesc: Gain Damage Reduction at low health.

Description: [Bulwark] Your Shield now regenerates at 120% effectiveness, and regenerates even while it is active.
ShortDesc: Your shield recharges while it is raised.

Description: [Weapon] Increase your Attack Speed by 40%, but reduce your damage-per-shot by 25%.
[Commander's Grab] Targets hit by Commander's Grab are Stunned for an additional 1.4s.
ShortDesc: Victim's of Commander's Grab are stunned for an additional 1.4s.

Description: [Sensor Drone] Your Sensor Drones explode, dealing 600 damage and applying a Knockback to those hit when an enemy is within 20 units.
ShortDesc: If an enemy is close to your Sensor Drone, it explodes dealing damage and knocking back

Description: [Weapon] After firing continuously for 2s, gain 10% increased damage.
ShortDesc: Deal increased damage after firing for 2s.

Description: [Armor] Deflector Shield's Health is increased by 500. Reduce its Cooldown by half if it is destroyed by an enemy, this Cooldown reduction can only occur once every 9s.
ShortDesc: CD of deflector shield is halved if destroyed, 9s icd; increase shield health by 500

Description: [Weapon] Detonating a Magic Mark also damages all enemies within 15 units of the victim for 75% of its damage.
ShortDesc: Detonating Magic Mark deals damage in an area.

Description: [Armor] When you get an Elimination, drop a Health Pack that Heals the entire team for 900 when picked up by an ally. Health Packs are visible to allies and are not able to be seen or interacted with by the opposing team.
ShortDesc: Eliminations leave Health Drops that heal you for or your teammate when picked up

Description: [Scamper] Using Scamper Heals allies within 25 units and you for 600 over 3s.
ShortDesc: using scamper applies a HoT to yourself and nearby allies

Description: [Kindle Soul] Kindle Soul also heals allies within 35 units of your target at 50% effectiveness. Excludes yourself. Curative (+20% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Kindle Soul heals allies within 35 units of your target at 50% effectiveness.

Description: [Wrath] Increase the Attack Speed bonus of Wrath to 15% per tier. Surgery (+10% Damage Done)
ShortDesc: Wrath's Attack Speed bonus is increased to 15%.

Description: [Pyre Strike] Refiring Pyre Strike stops it in place. Any ally in its beam is Healed for 150 every 0.1s for 1.5s. Additional hits refresh the effect. Remedy (+5% Damage and +10% Healing Done)
ShortDesc: Pyre Strike can now be refired to stop movement, and it heals allies within.

Description: [Weapon] Generate 1 Energy for every 80 damage done with your Submachine Guns.
ShortDesc: Dealing damage with SMGs restores Stamina.

Description: [Cyclone Strike] Cyclone Strike deals 125% of its target's maximum Health as damage over its duration and your Movement Speed is increased by 25% during the attack.
ShortDesc: [Cyclone Strike] Cyclone Strike now deals 100% of target's health as damage over its duration.

Description: [Dragon Stance] Dragon Stance consumes Health instead of Energy at a rate of 200 Health per second. Dragon Stance requires at least 300 Health to activate and automatically cancels at 15 Health.
ShortDesc: Dragon Stance consumes health instead of energy.

Description: [Harpoon] Harpoon lodges into terrain and explodes when an enemy comes within 20 units, dealing 1000 damage in a 35-unit-radius area.
[Harpoon] Harpoon no longer has a Cooldown, but no longer Slows enemies hit.
[Weapon] The projectile launched by reloading your Cursed Howitzer explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on contact.
[Armor] Remaining still for 1s creates a Mana Rift around you that generates Mana every 1s. Leaving the Mana Rift destroys it.
[Pyre Ball] Each of your Pyre Balls explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on hit and generate more Mana, but the damage of Pyre Ball when fully charged is reduced to 800.
[Frost Bolt] Frost Bolt Chains to a nearby enemy within 30 units, dealing 225 damage.
ShortDesc: Frost Bolt bounces

Description: [Setback] Setback becomes a lobbed explosive, capable of Rewinding multiple enemies.
ShortDesc: Setback is now a lobbed projectile that explodes

Description: [Stasis Field] Greatly increase the size of Stasis Field, but its Duration is decreased to 3.5 seconds and its Cooldown is increased to 18s.
ShortDesc: Statis Field is larger but has a shorter duration.

Description: [Second Chance] When you use Second Chance you also Rewind enemies within 20 units 3s into the past.
[Moonlight] Allies being Healed by Moonlight take 15% reduced damage.
[Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] When Io or Luna heal an ally other than each other, the other is also healed at 50% efficiency.
[Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] If Io falls below 200 Health while Luna is active, she trades places with Luna, Heals for 50% of her Health, and Luna dies in her stead.
[Cataclysm] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 60%.
ShortDesc: Slam talent

Description: [Juggernaut] Reduce your damage taken by 40% while using Juggernaut.
[Soul Harvest] All your living allies are Healed for 1.5% of their maximum Health for each Soul Harvested.
[Weapon] Bladed Chakrams are able to bounce 2 additional times before disappearing.
[Heavy Blade] Heavy Blade now explodes on reactivation instead of recalling, but the initial throw does reduced damage.
[Crouching Tigron] Crouching Tigron now has 2 charges and deals 600 damage in a 20-unit-radius area on landing.
[Abyssal Reconstruction] Your Marked ally gains 15% Crowd Control reduction, 15% Cooldown reduction, 15% Reload Speed increase, and they are Healed for 75 every 1s.
ShortDesc: Base buff-while-marked talent

Description: [Mark of Fate] Decrease the percentage of Healing given to Marked targets by 20%, but you can have two Marks out at a time.
[Projection] Enemies hit by Projection are stunned for 1s and any enemy caught between your Projection and you when you Teleport takes 800 damage.
[Obliteration] Obliteration now Silences enemies hit for 2.5s.
[Tendril] Tendril gains a second charge, but its Cooldown is increased by 2s.
Your Dark Siphon now deals an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health as damage over 1.5s.
[Caustic Spray] Augment your acid, increasing the damage done by Caustic Spray to 42, the damage of acid pools to 40, and increase the Movement Speed of allies within your acid pools by 20%.

[Primal Vision] Allied players within range of your Primal Vision gain a stackable 90-Health Shield and 15% increased Movement Speed for 4s each time you pulse, but your Primal Vision has its Cooldown increased by 2s.
[Armor] Heal for 110 every 1s while on an objective and for 1s after leaving the objective. This effect increases the longer you maintain it, up to 275 every 1s.
Distortion Field now damages enemies for 200 every .5s for the duration of Distortion Field and heals allies for 125 every .5 seconds while inside of the field.
ShortDesc: Distortion Filed damages enemies and heals allies

Description: Enemies are rooted in place when they are hit by the pre fire beam and the Creeping Barrage deals 1450 damage.
ShortDesc: Enemies are rooted in place when they are hit by the ult pre fire

Description: Upon landing with the Commanding Leap ability create a small pool underneath you that will heal both you and allies for 600 health over 1.5s. Octavia's ammo is not consumed while standing inside of this field.
ShortDesc: Landing Commander's Leap will create a healing pool for yourself and allies.

Description: [Weapon] Reduce the Cooldown of your basic abilities by 10% after hitting an enemy with at least one Kunai. This can activate only once per throw.
[Ambush] Your Ambush gains an additional charge and can now be used on allies.
[Shadow Bombs] Increase the explosion radius of Shadow Bombs by 5 units and they now home to enemies.
Increase the range of Chain Heal bounces by 40%.
[Spirit Link] Spirit Link's Cooldown is increased to 7s and it now only lasts for 4s, but its base effects are tripled.
[Spirit Link] While Envelop is active and you are Linked to an enemy, prevent them from Healing.
Ricocheted shots now target two enemies and deal 200% more damage to Shields.
The Dead Ringer Decoy is now rigged to explode! The Dead Ringer decoy will now explode when enemies are close, dealing 650 damage to enemies within a 20 unit radius.
ShortDesc: Cheap decoys, bigger explosions

Description: Blast Back now knocks enemies straight up and enemies take 20% more DMG from Saati for 1.5s.
ShortDesc: Blast Back now knocks enemies straight up and they take more DMG from Saati.

Description: Your Ire no longer decays due to not taking or dealing damage, but you no longer gain the passive damage increase while above Ire threshold.
Gain 30% Lifesteal on your hits with Judgement.
Augment Reckoning, Sanctuary, and Conviction, but increase their base Cooldown by 25%.
Overcharge your Grappling Hook to now pull non-Frontline Champions to VII. Reduce Grappling Hooks damage by 100, its Charges by 1, and its Cooldown by 2s.
ShortDesc: Grappling Hook now pulls non-Frontline Champions, but deals 100 damage and has 1 Charge.

Description: Explosive Dodge - Drop an explosion where you land and take off from; decrease the cooldown by 30% and increase range by 25%

Heavy SMG has three elemental effects: Fire imbued Mag Dump -- dealing damage over time, Electrically charged burst mode -- dealing damage and Revealing on stacks, and Ice infused Automatic -- shots slows enemies.
[Hail of Bombs] Reduce the range of Hail of Bombs by 50%, concentrating the explosions in a smaller area, and reduce the Cooldown of Hail of Bombs by 2s.
[Weapon] Explosive damage sets enemies on fire for 0.175% of their maximum Health every 0.1s for 1.5s. Additional hits refresh the duration.
[Explosive Personality] Reduce the Cooldown of Explosive Personality by 5s, but reduce your Movement Speed by 15%.
[Armor] Decrease the Blood cost of your abilities by 35% and increase your Healing done by 15%, but reduce the damage you do by 25%.
[Swarm] Swarm is now cast on yourself and follows you around instead of being placed on the ground, its ability cost is decreased by 25%, and its radius is increased by 30%.
ShortDesc: Blood me please

Description: [Weapon] Your projectiles from The Crimson Heart now pierce and deal 90 more damage to subsequent enemies hit after piercing, but their size is reduced by 20%.
ShortDesc: Projectiles size is decreased by 20% but now pierces enemies, dealing more dmg for each subsequent enemy hit by 90 damage.

Description: The Cooldown of Deadly Momentum is permanently set to 5s and cannot be modified, reduced, or increased through other means. Gain 1 stack of Piercing and Sharp Momentum for each enemy hit with Deadly Momentum.
[War] Increase the Range and Damage of War, but decrease its rate of fire. War's attacks now deal an additional 20% damage to each enemy hit for each enemy hit in total with your attack.
ShortDesc: Caspian Talent

Description: Automatically fire a weaker copy of Rogue's Tempo for every 2 Ammo consumed. This copy deals 400 damage and Slows enemies by 15% for 0.5s.
Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 3% and Movement Speed by 5% per stack of Curse currently on enemies.
ShortDesc: Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 3% and Movement Speed by 5% per stack of Curse currently on enemies.

Description: When a Spirit Trap is triggered, reactivate to teleport to the trap and detonate it. Increase the explosion radius by 25%, Curse stacks applied by 2, and it Fears instead of Slowing.
ShortDesc: Spirit Traps no longer automatically explode. Reactive the ability when a trap triggers to teleport to it and increase the potency of the explosion.

Description: Extend the duration of your Body and Soul by 1s. After the ability ends, Heal for 70% of the damage your body took (minimum of 15% max health) while traveling, unaffected by Anti-Healing
ShortDesc: Extend the duration of your Body and Soul by 1s. Heal for 70% of the damage your body took while traveling after the ability ends, unaffected by Cauterize.

Description: Enemies that pass through Abyssal Fortress are Revealed and take 10% additional weapon damage from you and your allies for 3s. Reduce Abyssal Fortress' Cooldown by 2s.
ShortDesc: Enemies are Revealed take more weapon damage after walking through Abyssal Fortress. Reduce CD by 2s.

Description: Rift Slash Cripples enemies it hits for 1.25s, and the resulting Abyssal Rift lasts 1s longer.
ShortDesc: Rift Slash Cripples enemies, and Abyssal Rift explodes 1s later.

Description: Royal Presence's reactivation now only hits the first enemy in its path, and instead Roots them for 2.25s. Increase the Range of the reactivation by 50%.
ShortDesc: Royal Presence reactivation now roots, but only hits the first person and has range increased.

Description: [Aphotic Reaver] Aphotic Reaver is permanently set to Antumbra mode.
